summary: Timeline_20 documents managing panic disorder and agoraphobia with professional help.

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm disgusting I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I isolated myself from all my friends But I've been practicing the breathing exercises called the crisis hotline and it's starting to help. Small steps are still progress
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I feel empty inside I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I've been having suicidal thoughts Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. reached out for help Taking a mental health day tomorrow. Things can get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I can't do anything right I can't see a future for myself Started using the coping strategies from therapy. wrote in my journal I'm trying to be patient with myself. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. I'm tired of existing I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I've been drinking to cope Today though, I managed to practiced my coping strategies which is a small victory.
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I hate myself so much I gave up trying Managed to shower and eat breakfast. went for a walk to clear my head Small steps are still steps forward. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I can't do anything right My performance has been terrible. I isolated myself from all my friends Met with HR about accommodations. set healthy boundaries They're being supportive. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I deserve to suffer I can't see a future for myself Called my psychiatrist first. reached out for help We're trying a different medication instead. I'm building a support system
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I'm tired of existing I'm losing my mind Managed to shower and eat breakfast. wrote in my journal Small steps are still steps forward. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. Nothing will ever get better I don't care about anything anymore But yesterday I finally set healthy boundaries and scheduled an appointment. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I hate myself so much I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I can't see a future for myself Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. talked to a friend about what I'm going through Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I'm building a support system
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm broken beyond repair I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I gave up trying But I've been practicing the breathing exercises reached out to my therapist and it's starting to help. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. Everyone would be better off without me I hurt myself again Using the distraction techniques I learned. practiced my coping strategies Reached out to my crisis support instead. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I'm tired of existing My performance has been terrible. I isolated myself from all my friends Met with HR about accommodations. tried a new coping mechanism They're being supportive. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends

posts.text: Starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel. joined a support group Therapy is really helping. I'm worth the effort Still have rough days. I have no reason to keep going But they're getting less frequent. I isolated myself from all my friends
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
I isolated myself from all my friends

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I'm a burden to everyone All this therapy for nothing. I'm failing at everything My therapist reminded me how far I've come. joined a support group Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
